title: Beatless
synopsis: With great advancements in technology, mankind has created hIEs, human-like robots that act as public and personal servants for society. Unlike many others, the kind-hearted high school student Arato Endou treats hIEs as equals, but his financial situation keeps him from ever owning one.
voices: ['Touyama, Nao', 'Yoshinaga, Takuto', 'Tomioka, Misako', 'Amamiya, Sora', 'Satake, Uki', 'Ono, Saki', 'Igarashi, Hiromi', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Shimoji, Shino', 'Hanazawa, Kana']
staff: [['Mizushima, Seiji', ['Director']], ['Kikuta, Hiromi', ['Sound Director']], ['Yamashita, Shingo', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamamoto, Yoosuke', ['Episode Director']]]
